name: Dick Diver
description: '''Dick Diver''' is an Australian four-piece indie pop band from [[Melbourne]], [[Victoria (Australia)]]. The band consists of Rupert Edwards (guitar) and Alistair McKay (guitar), Steph Hughes (drums) and [[Al Montfort]] (bass). It took its name from the character Dick Diver in the novel ''[[Tender Is the Night]]'' by F. Scott Fitzgerald.{{Citation needed|date=August 2016}}
